CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 7, 1953, pg. 3, reads: "On Election Day - The Courier camera caught the left photo Tuesday afternoon while they were on a short lunch period at Crawford Grill Two. They are, going clockwise, Lou Smith, tipstaff; Matt Anderson, secretary of the Fifth Ward Democratic Committee; Herman Slome, student in University of Pittsburgh's class in American Practical Politics, under a Falk Foundation Grant; Prothonotary David B. Roberts and State Representative Paul F. Jones.  Mr. Roberts subbed for the uncapacitated Democratic chairman of the Fifth Ward, Robert E. (Pappy) Williams, and was assisted by Matt Anderson and Paul F. Jones... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men, including Lou Smith, Matt Anderson and Herman Slome holding cigarettes, Prothonotary David B. Roberts, and Paul Jones standing on right, around booth, in Crawford Gill no. 2, for lunch break during 1953 election day
